headline: Modern Love: The Podcast | Episode 3
text:
Welcome to the third episode of Modern Love: The Podcast. This week, you’ll hear the actress Sarah Paulson (“Carol,” “American Horror Story,” “12 Years a Slave”) read a 2010 Modern Love essay by Amy Seek titled “Open Adoption: Not So Simple Math.” Look for the “play” button below.

If you’re in the mood for more, check out the first two episodes of the podcast and read a letter from the Modern Love editor Daniel Jones.
